DOC.brief_summary: Safety, Immunogenicity of an Adjuvanted Quadrivalent Subunit Influenza Virus Vaccine Compared to Non-Adjuvanted Comparator Influenza Vaccine in Children Previously vaccinated in Trial V118_05. Subjects will receive either the Same or Alternate Type of Vaccine.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study to Evaluate Safety, Immunogenicity of Investigational Flu Vaccine Compared to an Approved Flu Vaccine in Children Previously Vaccinated in Trial V118_05 (NCT01964989)
DOC.criteria: Male or female subject who has completed their last visit in trial V118_05. Subject's parent/legal guardian has voluntarily given written informed consent after the nature of the study has been explained according to local regulatory requirements, prior to study enter Individuals recently vaccinated against influenza Subjects with contraindications to receive influenza vaccines Please contact the site for additional eligibility criteria.
